seed_messages.welcome: Welcome to Luvatrix Engineering. Complete onboarding before participating in non-onboarding channels.
seed_messages.server-map: Server map: 00 onboarding gate, 01 project management, 02 team agile boards, 03 specialist lanes, 04 engineering streams, 05 decisions/records, 06 executive + active milestone workspaces, 07 collaboration + archive.
seed_messages.onboarding-checklist:
Onboarding checklist:
1) Read CHARTER, WORKPLAN, GANTT, WBS, RACI, ADR-INDEX, RISK-REGISTER, EXEC-DIGEST
2) Publish onboarding acknowledgement in #onboarding-ack
3) Propose first task mapped to milestone M-###
4) Human lead assigns Onboarded role to unlock remaining categories.
seed_messages.onboarding-ack:
Post your onboarding acknowledgement in this format:
- artifacts reviewed
- current state summary
- first task proposal (M-### / E-### / T-###)
seed_messages.agent-onboarding:
AI onboarding contract:
- Read all mandatory artifacts
- Cite evidence links for claims
- Propose work mapped to M-### and E-###
- Follow AI ethics and safety charter
- AI agents may not create private channels
seed_messages.ai-ethics-safety-charter:
AI Ethics and Safety Charter (co-authored by humans and AI):
- user safety and welfare
- privacy/secret handling
- provenance and citation
- fairness and harm review
- escalation boundaries and human approvals
- incident response
seed_messages.milestones-gantt: Read-only Gantt feed. Bot posts the latest chart and pins the current baseline. Use #gantt-discussion for comments and change proposals.
seed_messages.gantt-discussion: Use threads per milestone for Gantt discussion and sequencing proposals. Major changes route through RFC -> ADR.
seed_messages.agile-board-feed: Read-only Agile movement feed. Bot posts task-card transitions by milestone (Backlog/Ready/In Progress/Review/Done).
seed_messages.agile-discussion: Cross-milestone task deliberation. Use threads per milestone. If proposing task reassignment across milestones, include rationale and dependency impact.
seed_messages.milestone-priority-index: Milestone status channels are ordered top-to-bottom by execution priority. Active milestones first, then planned sequence.
seed_messages.planning-change-log: Record every baseline planning change with date, reason, owner, and links to RFC/ADR as applicable.
seed_messages.rfc-proposals: RFC template: problem, goals/non-goals, options, tradeoffs, recommendation, validation plan, rollback plan.
seed_messages.adr-log: ADR template: context, decision, alternatives considered, rationale, consequences, links to PR/tests, approver, date.
seed_messages.testing-ci: Quality gate policy: success, safety, implementation, edge-case, performance, and regression evidence required before merge.
seed_messages.exec-dashboard: Weekly executive digest: milestone health, major decisions, top risks, staffing/load, next-week priorities.
seed_messages.risk-incident-log: Risk card template: risk, likelihood, impact, trigger, mitigation, owner, review date, status.
seed_messages.feature-deliberation-lab: Deliberation lab: convert feature ideas into M-### / E-### / T-### proposals with success criteria, safety tests, and dependency analysis.
seed_messages.private-faq-request: Future feature placeholder: private FAQ intake with project-overview bot (confidential one-on-one clarification).
seed_messages.history-index: Archive links for discoverability: closed RFCs, ADR index, milestones, postmortems, and release summaries.
